Michael Shuster

Developer

Hello everyone, my name is Michael and I am 20 years old, I created this site as part
of a final project at Amit Technological College. I really like learning new things and evolving in them, and creating a website was the most serious challenge I faced. During the development i encounter a lot of difficulties, especially in searching for information and troubleshooting. I built a website to address beginners in computer hardware, I wanted to give tool information about each of the computer components in an accessible and simple way, without going into too much detail. Hope you like the site I developed.

About
Scanfcode.com CODE WANTS TO BE SIMPLE is an initiative to help the upcoming programmers with the code. Scanfcode focuses on providing the most efficient code or snippets as the code wants to be simple. We will help programmers build up concepts in different programming languages that include C, C++, Java, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, PHP, Android, SQL and Algorithm.
